response.original_title: The Adventures of Twitch and Scummy
response.overview: Jeremy Stenberg is Twitch. Colin Morrison is Scummy. Together these over-the edge, off-the-charts freestyle stars of moto take you on a trip you will never forget. Huge air, huge attitude and a never say die approach to life makes this one of the best a most outrageous moto vids ever made. Other featured riders include: Mike Metzger, Beau Manley, Ronnie Faisst, Brian Deegan, Doug Parsons and Seth Enslow.
response.title: The Adventures of Twitch and Scummy
